description.value: You study the subtle, intangible forces that can be found in every particle and mote of magic in the universe around you. During your daily preparations, you can meditate on these spiritual and celestial mysteries and gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Additional Lore] skill feat in any Lore skill subcategory of your choice. This feat (and your proficiency in the Lore skill granted by it) lasts until you make your daily preparations again. Since both the feat and proficiency are temporary, you can't use them to satisfy a prerequisite for a skill increase or permanent character option (like a feat).
